arts.ttl: Chelsea defender Ben Chilwell set to undergo medical at Crystal Palace ahead of six-month loan move to the Eagles
arts.sum: Chelsea defender Ben Chilwell will have a medical tomorrow at Crystal Palace once the final details are ironed out on a six month loan deal.

arts.ttl: Palace believed 'great win' would happen - Glasner
arts.sum: Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner says his side believed that their "great win" would happen against Manchester United at Old Trafford in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Palace agree deal with Chelsea for Chilwell loan
arts.sum: Crystal Palace have agreed a deal with Chelsea to sign Ben Chilwell on loan for rest of the season.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace now holding talks to sign Â£35m player in transfer deadline day deal - journalist
Ruben Amorim insists Man United are 'trying everything' to bring in a striker before the window closes after 2-0 defeat to Crystal Palace
arts.sum: NATHAN SALT AT OLD TRAFFORD: Ruben Amorim vowed that Man United will do 'everything' they can to bring a striker in before Monday's 11pm transfer deadline.

arts.ttl: Report: Crystal Palace close to agreeing deal with Champions League defender
arts.sum: Crystal Palace are pushing to sign AC Milan defender Strahinja Pavlovic in a deal worth around Â£25 million before the transfer window closes on Monday, according to journalist Alan Nixon.
